api_key.title: StackAdapt API Key
api_key.description: API Key used to interact with the StackAdapt API

stat_type.title: Stats Type
stat_type.description: The type of stats to retrieve. Currently only time-based types are allowed: 'total', 'daily', and 'hourly'.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date in the format of 'yyyy-mm-dd'. The start date is required if you are pulling daily or hourly stats.
